title: HELP in identify a font, PLEASE
content:
hello, I need to identify these fonts.

Can someone help me? Very thankful, I’ve coming from myfonts forum and after a long searching. All help is so important to me.

Sincerely

John,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150436im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/a_5778.jpg)

 [‹ Font to approximate a library stamp](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150436/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43131 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for a 7. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150436/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43081 "Go to next forum topic")
author: johnmeing

comments.content: This looks to be more than one font. Have you tried looking at Fonts For Flash? [http://www.fontsforflash.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150436/http:/www.fontsforflash.com/ "http://www.fontsforflash.com/")

THANKS A LOT KEN,

I’M GOING TO TRY THOSE GUYS.

ONCE AGAIN, MANY THANKS.
Looks like the old Geneva or Monaco bitmap.

NOT MUCH LUCKY. PLEASE I NEED HELP, I NEED TO GET THESE 2 TYPES OF FONT.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150436im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/a_3705.jpg)
